markdown:
**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 135 1.1 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- Geometric patterns are etched into the smooth brown and gray surface of a _staff of earth_, which makes a solid thud whenever tapped against the ground. While wielding a _staff of_ earth, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude saves and DC against effects that [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) you or knock you [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Staff of Earth **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 135 1.1 **Price** 60 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_scatter scree_](/Spells.aspx?ID=990)
  • **1st** [_pummeling rubble_](/Spells.aspx?ID=708)
Staff of Earth (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 135 1.1 **Price** 450 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **2nd** [_expeditious excavation_](/Spells.aspx?ID=574), [_pummeling rubble_](/Spells.aspx?ID=708)
  • **3rd** [_earthbind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=94), [_shifting sand_](/Spells.aspx?ID=586)
Staff of Earth (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 135 1.1 **Price** 1,800 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **4th** _expeditious excavation_, [_shape stone_](/Spells.aspx?ID=276), [_spike stones_](/Spells.aspx?ID=717)
  • **5th** [_blazing fissure_](/Spells.aspx?ID=870), [_wall of stone_](/Spells.aspx?ID=365)
name: Staff of Earth (Major)
